# Read strace

```{r}
# Need to be rewritten!
strace_discards <- c("^/lib", "^/etc", "^/lib64", "^/usr", "^/var", "^/opt",
                         "^/sys" , "^/proc", "^/tmp", "^.$", paste0("^", .libPaths()))

data_strace <- whirl::read_strace("prgQmd.strace") |> dplyr::tibble()
str(data_strace)
file_actions <- whirl::refine_strace(data_strace)
file_actions$input |> dplyr::tibble() |> head() |> dplyr::select(c("time", "type"))
```
